and.name: Track Modification
and.description: Track interactions to modify opened track or to creat new routes

and.name: Data Diagram
and.description: Visualization of two parameters which are connected as a diagram

and.name: General Information
and.description: Display general track information of a recorded track. This data is stored within the file in most cases

feature.name: Time
feature.description: Total time in which the track recorded

feature.name: Altitude
feature.description: Show altitude - according to time/distance over the whole track - total

feature.name: Heart Rate
feature.description: Show heart rate - according to time over the whole track - average

feature.name: GPX
feature.description: Standard supported file type. GPX is the most often used file type to save gps data/coordinates

feature.name: Other
feature.description: Other file type which shall not be support in a free basic version

feature.name: Save
feature.description: Save modified or newly created tracks.

feature.name: Status Bar
feature.description: General status bar to display actual information of the program

and.name: Google Earth Integration
and.description: Additional feature to visualize the route within a 3D map

feature.name: FlyOver
feature.description: Possibilty to use Google Earth to fly over a predefinied or open track.

feature.name: More Maps
feature.description: More supported map hoster (shall not be included in free/light version)

feature.name: Cropped Map Images
feature.description: Possibility to download map tiles for offline usage. With or without shown track

feature.name: Move Map
feature.description: Move map into specific direction - up/down - left/right
